channel.title: How to use VPS to host a RSPS
channel.description: How do i use a VPS to host my RSPS i will be hosting off of http://www.accuwebhosting.com/ and have no idea how to setup the server or run it. I would like the VPS to make a RSPS open so other players can join from webclients and downloaded clients. I have no idea how and i am willing to skype for help. Skype: kylejohnson59

item.title: How to use VPS to host a RSPS

item.description:
